scripts.c: g++ main.cpp AsymmetricEncryption/asymmetricEncryption.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
scripts.file: g++ fileWork.cpp list.cpp student.cpp myMath.cpp -std=c++20 -g -o a.out
scripts.test: g++ tests.cpp AsymmetricEncryption/asymmetricEncryption.cpp Encryption/encryption.cpp BigInt/bigInt.cpp MyMath/myMath.cpp -std=c++20 -g -o a.out && ./a.out
